name: Easypromos Plugin
author: Easypromos

sections.description: Connect your Easypromos account with your WordPress website or blog. Take advantage of the converting power of online promotions and transform anonymous website, e-commerce and blog visitors into qualified leads. You can embed your promotions choosing between two presentation forms: campaigns embedded as a section or block, or displayed as a pop-up window.
sections.faq:
Why embed promotions on your website or blog?

Displaying promotions on your website or blog allows you to capture contact details of anonymous visitors to your site. Users are attracted by the opportunity of winning a prize, entering a big prize draw, or receiving a discount code for their purchase. Generally speaking, digital promotions increase the conversion rate.

What is the Easypromos plugin used for?

Easypromos promotions can be embedded on your website or blog thanks to widgets available on the promotion platform. The Easypromos plugin provides a simple way to integrate online promotions into your WordPress site; it allows you to directly adjust the width and height of the promotion without having to edit the widget code through the Easypromos platform. If youâ€™re planning to regularly launch digital promotions for your site, then the plugin will save you a lot of setup time.

What promotions can I embed with the Easypromos plugin?

The Easypromos plugin enables you to embed all game, questionnaire, contest, coupon and code applications, as well as the Entry Form Giveaway app. The plugin is available in the Premium and White Label versions.

Can I check how many participants registered through the plugin?
